name: elpm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cpm, c2)), wa(wfun(c0), wss(c0, cxp(c2, c1))))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cpm, c2)), wa(wfun(c0), wss(c0, cxp(c2, c1)))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cpm, c2)), wa(wfun(c0), wss(c0, cxp(c2, c1))))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cpm, c2)), wa(wfun(c0), wss(c0, cxp(c2, c1)))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cpm, c2)), wa(wfun(c0), wss(c0, cxp(c2, c1)))))
